issue.title: [Java] Support compressing RecordBatch IPC buffers by LZ4
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10880](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10880). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Support compressing/decompressing RecordBatch IPC buffers by LZ4.
